Optimizers in Deep Learning

An optimizer is a crucial element that fine-tunes a neural network's parameters during training, minimizing the model's error or loss function to enhance performance. Various optimization algorithms, known as optimizers, employ distinct strategies to converge towards optimal parameter values for improved predictions efficiently.

Key Concepts:

  • optimization algorithms
  • parameter tuning
  • loss function minimization
  • neural network training
optimizer deep learning stochastic gradient descent adam rmsprop
